name: udemy_search
description: Search for courses on Udemy. Returns up to 15 results with course name, instructor, rating, student count, price, and URL.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query (e.g. 'web development', 'python for beginners', 'graphic design')

steps.code: const results = []; const items = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="course-card"], [data-purpose="course-card-container"], [class*="CourseCard"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(items.length, 15); i++) { const el = items[i]; const titleEl = el.querySelector('h3, [data-purpose="course-title-url"] div, [class*="title"]'); const instructorEl = el.querySelector('[data-purpose="safely-set-inner-html:course-card:visible-instructors"], [class*="instructor"], [class*="teacher"]'); const ratingEl = el.querySelector('[class*="rating"] span, [data-purpose="rating-number"]'); const studentsEl = el.querySelector('[class*="enrollment"], [class*="students"]'); const priceEl = el.querySelector('[data-purpose="course-price-text"] span, [class*="price"] span, [class*="price-text"]'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a[href*="/course/"]'); const imgEl = el.querySelector('img[src*="img-c"], img[src*="udemy"], img'); const levelEl = el.querySelector('[class*="level"], [class*="difficulty"]'); const durationEl = el.querySelector('[class*="duration"], [class*="content-length"]'); const bestsellerEl = el.querySelector('[class*="bestseller"], [data-purpose="badge"]'); results.push({ name: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', instructor: instructorEl ? instructorEl.textContent.trim() : '', rating: ratingEl ? ratingEl.textContent.trim() : '', students: studentsEl ? studentsEl.textContent.trim() : '', price: priceEl ? priceEl.textContent.trim() : '', level: levelEl ? levelEl.textContent.trim() : '', duration: durationEl ? durationEl.textContent.trim() : '', is_bestseller: !!bestsellerEl, image: imgEl ? imgEl.getAttribute('src') : '', url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '' }); } return { query: `{{query}}`, result_count: results.length, results: results }
steps.name: search_results
steps.label: Extract course results
